posts.post_content:
Knocked off 2 more C46 catchers this week. Waitng for Jersey City catchers Butler and Wells. Have 10 of the 12 C46 catchers now!

Need just 2 more C46 catchers: Mitchell (Buffalo) and Hardy (Montreal).

I know there is a nice Hardy on eBay but the seller only does PayPal, which I no longer use. Looking for creaseless examples with minimal chipping. I also have a Graham duplicate available as well.


Thanks,

Patrick
